oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Color Sergeant Andrew Geddes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of Color Sergeant Andrew Geddes, 105th Ohio Inf. Regt., on the crest of Lookout Mountain, Tennessee. The regimental history of the 105th Ohio contains an illustration taken from this photograph. The 105th Ohio Vol. Inf. Regt. fought at; Perryville, Kentucky, the Tullahoma Campaign, Chickamauga, Missionary Ridge, the Atlanta Campaign, the March to the Sea, the Carolinas and Bentonville, North Carolina.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Geddes, Andrew
